selectAPresetOrCustomizeYourPortfolio: Select a preset or customize your portfolio
selectAPresetBelowOrCustomYourPortfolio: Select a preset below, or custom your portfolio.
rebalanceNowDescription: The following trades will be execute if you choose to rebalance now.
WhenCoinDropsByXAmountSellYAmountOfYourP: When {{coinName}} drops by {{dropPercent}} sell {{sellPercent}} of your portfolio for {{USDTSymbol}}
makeSureToAllocate100%OfYourPortfolio: Make sure to allocate 100% of your portfolio
RebalancingFrequencyDescription: Rebalancing frequency is the frequency at which your portfolio will be rebalanced. Rebalancing is the process of realigning the weightings of a portfolio of assets. Rebalancing involves periodically buying or selling assets in a portfolio to maintain an original or desired level of asset allocation or risk
updateFrequencyDescription: This will update the rebalancing frequency and change the next rebalancing date. Are you sure you want to continue?
deleteFrequencyDescription: This will delete the rebalancing frequency and your portfolio wont rebalance as scheduled. Are you sure you want to continue?
noExitStrategySet: You have not set an exit strategy
haveExitStrategy: When Portfloio <blueText>{{assetChangeType}} {{assetChangeValue}}</blueText> you will <blueText>sell {{assetSellPercentage}}</blueText> of your overall portfolio
exitStrategyDescription: Set a contigency plan to sell a portion of your portfolio value when it hits a certain threshold for USDT
updateExitStrategyDescription: Are you sure you want to update this exit strategy?
deleteExitStrategyDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this exit strategy?
createExitStrategyDescription: Are you sure you want to create this exit strategy?
noTradeData: You have not made any trades
somethingWentWrongWhileFetchingYourSmart: Something went wrong while fetching your smart allocation
setAContingencyPlanToSell: Set a contingency plan to sell a portion or all of your portfolio value when it hits a certain threshold for USDT.
rebalancingACryptoPortfolioMeaning: Rebalancing a crypto portfolio means redistributing asset allocation to maintain the original or desired allocation or risk.
yourUSDTHoldingsWillBeUsedOnTheNextRebal: Your USDT holdings will be used on the next re-balancing
thisStableCoinWillNotBeUsedInSmartAlloca: This stable coin will not be used in smart allocation
